a.n: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich

p.k: Live from 'Jazzclub Unterfahrt' in Munich, Germany, Finnish pianist Aki Rissanen performs his original compositions. Together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Aki Rissanen Trio showcases the best of the Nordic Tone.
p.d: Aki Rissanen's interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from 'Jazzclub Unterfahrt' in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.
